mapper.select: select article_comment.id,articleCommentArticleId, articleCommentUserId,name,icon,articleCommentContent, articleCommentDate from article_comment join user on article_comment.articleCommentUserId = user.id where article_comment.articleCommentArticleId = #{articleId} order by articleCommentDate desc
